'''11w49a''' is the third [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.1]], released on December 8, 2011,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/http://mojang.com/2011/12/minecraft-development-snapshot-week-49/|title=Minecraft Development Snapshot Week 49|website=Mojang.com|date=December 8, 2011}}</ref> which adds [[spawn egg]]s and different [[language]]s.

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Spawn Egg]]s'''
* Creative-exclusive item which can spawn the following mobs:
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 61 JE1.png|32px]] [[Blaze]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 59 JE1.png|32px]] [[Cave Spider]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 1 JE1.png|32px]] [[Chicken]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 92 JE1.png|32px]] [[Cow]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 50 JE1.png|32px]] [[Creeper]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 58 JE1.png|32px]] [[Enderman]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 24 JE1.png|32px]] [[Ghast]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 2 JE1.png|32px]] [[Magma Cube]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 4 JE1.png|32px]] [[Mooshroom]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 30 JE1.png|32px]] [[Pig]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 91 JE1.png|32px]] [[Sheep]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 0 JE1.png|32px]] [[Silverfish]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 19 JE1.png|32px]] [[Skeleton]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 55 JE1.png|32px]] [[Slime]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 52 JE1.png|32px]] [[Spider]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 2 JE1.png|32px]] [[Squid]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 28 JE1.png|32px]] [[Villager]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 35 JE1.png|32px]] [[Wolf]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 54 JE1.png|32px]] [[Zombie]]'''
** '''[[File:Spawn Egg 57 JE1.png|32px]] [[Zombie Pigman]]'''

=== General ===
'''[[Language]] files'''
* Added multiple languages.

'''[[Server.properties]]'''
* New setting:
** <code>spawn-npcs</code>

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:White Sheep JE1.png|32px]] [[Sheep]]'''
* Can now eat [[grass block]]s and [[short grass]] to regrow their [[wool]].
* As a counterbalance, shearing sheep now yields 1–3 wool instead of 2–4.<ref>{{tweet|jeb_|144832220232826881|I decreased the amount of wool from 2-4 to 1-3 since wool regrows again|December 8, 2011}}</ref>

=== General ===
'''[[Pause menu]]'''
* Renamed the "Save and quit to title" button to "Save and Quit to Title".

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Chat]]'''
* [[Formatting code]] <code>§k</code> no longer make obfuscated text switch color randomly between {{color|#5555FF}} and {{color|#555555}}.

== Fixes ==
'''4 bugs fixed'''
* [[Farmland]] is no longer destroyed by [[item]]s and [[particles]].
* Corrected a <code>setTileEntity</code> [[multiplayer]] bug.
* Corrected a [[powered rail]] bug.
* Corrected a [[redstone]] update bug.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* [[11w50a]] is mislabeled as 11w49a.
* Pressing B allows the player to go into Creative mode without cheats.
* This was the first snapshot to have its own article at [[Mojang.com]].
